summary: TAKATA RECALL.  I CONTINUE TO CALL MERCEDES TO REPLACE THE AIRBAG AND THEY CONTINUE TO COMMUNICATE THAT THERE IS NO ETA AT THIS TIME FOR REPLACING THE AIRBAG WHICH MEANS THERE'S A PENDING STATUS PART REPLACEMENT.  WHAT CAN I DO AT THIS POINT? I'M AN ACCIDENT WAITING TO HAPPEN IN MY OPINION.  NO ACCIDENT HAS HAPPEN YET BUT WHO WANTS TO WAIT FOR IT TO HAPPEN!
